atk-abh03a10:2_0: 269. Idāni brahmacariyakathā hoti. Tattha dve brahmacariyavāsā, maggabhāvanā ca pabbajjā
atk-abh03a10:2_1: ca. Pabbajjā sabbadevesu natthi. Maggabhāvanā ṭhapetvā asaññasatte sesesu appaṭisiddhā.
atk-abh03a10:2_2: Tattha ye paranimmitavasavattideve upādāya taduparidevesu maggabhāvanampi na icchanti
atk-abh03a10:2_3: seyyathāpi sammitiyā, te sandhāya natthi devesūti pucchā sakavādissa. ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave,
atk-abh03a10:2_4: ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṁse.
atk-abh03a10:2_5: Katamehi tīhi? Sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso’’ti (a. ni. 9.21) idaṁ suttaṁ
atk-abh03a10:2_6: nissāya dvepi brahmacariyavāsā natthi devesūti uppannaladdhivasena paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a10:2_7: Puna dvinnampi brahmacariyānaṁ antarāyikadhammavaseneva sabbe devā jaḷāti pucchā
atk-abh03a10:2_8: sakavādissa. Tattha hatthasaṁvācikāti mūgā viya hatthamuddhāya vattāro. Parato atthi
atk-abh03a10:2_9: devesūti pucchā paravādissa, maggabhāvanaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. Paṭiññāya
atk-abh03a10:3_0: 270.Yattha natthi pabbajjāti pañhe gihīnañceva ekaccānañca devānaṁ maggapaṭilābhaṁ
atk-abh03a10:3_1: sandhāya paṭikkhepo tasseva. Puna puṭṭho paccantavāsino ceva asaññasatte ca sandhāya
atk-abh03a10:3_2: paṭiññā tasseva. Yo pabbajatītiādīsu pucchāsupi eseva nayo. Puna ‘‘atthi devesū’’ti
atk-abh03a10:3_3: pañhepi maggabhāvanaṁ sandhāyeva paṭiññā sakavādissa, ‘‘sabbadevesū’’ti vutte asaññasatte
atk-abh03a10:4: 271.Manussesūti pañhadvaye jambudīpake sandhāya paṭiññā. Paccantavāsino sandhāya paṭikkhepo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a10:5: Atthi yattha atthīti atthi te devā, atthi vā so padeso, yattha atthīti evaṁ sattapadesavibhāgamukhena vissajjanaṁ sakavādissa. Iminā nayena sabbe ekantarikapañhā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a10:6: 272. Suttānuyoge kuhiṁ phaluppattīti tassa anāgāmino arahattaphaluppatti kuhinti pucchā sakavādissa. Tatthevāti suddhāvāsesūti attho.
atk-abh03a10:7_0: Handa hīti kāraṇatthe nipāto. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – yasmā anāgāmipuggalo idha loke bhāvitena
atk-abh03a10:7_1: maggena tattha suddhāvāsesu phalaṁ sacchikaroti, na tattha aññaṁ maggaṁ bhāveti,
atk-abh03a10:9_0: 273. Idāni yadi aññattha bhāvitena maggena aññattha phalasacchikiriyā hoti, sotāpannādīnampi
atk-abh03a10:9_1: siyāti etamatthaṁ dassetuṁ puna anāgāmītiādīnaṁ saṁsandanapucchā sakavādissa. Tattha
atk-abh03a10:9_2: anāgāmissa phalasacchikiriyāya paṭiññā, sesānaṁ phalasacchikiriyāya paṭikkhepo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a10:9_3: Idha bhāvitamaggo hi anāgāmī idhavihāyaniṭṭho nāma hoti. So idha anāgāmimaggaṁ bhāvetvā
atk-abh03a10:9_5: arahattaphalaṁ sacchikarotī’’ti tassa laddhi. Sotāpannasakadāgāmino pana tattha maggaṁ
atk-abh03a10:9_6: bhāvetvā tatrupapattikā nāma hontīti tesaṁ idhāgamanaññeva natthi. Iti so anāgāmissa
atk-abh03a10:10_0: Anāgāmī puggalo tattha bhāvitena maggenāti pañhe ‘‘anāgāmino tattha maggabhāvanāva
atk-abh03a10:10_1: natthī’’ti laddhiyā paṭikkhipati. Maggo ca bhāvīyati, na ca kilesā pahīyantīti pucchā
atk-abh03a10:10_2: sakavādissa , rūpāvacaramaggaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa. Rūpāvacaramaggena hi so
atk-abh03a10:11_0: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyoti pañhe ‘‘opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī’’ti vacanato upapattiyāvassa
atk-abh03a10:11_1: katakaraṇīyādibhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Arahāti pañhe idhaparinibbāyino arahato
atk-abh03a10:11_2: vaseneva paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho tatthaparinibbāyino vasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a10:12_0: Atthi arahato punabbhavotiādīsupi tatthaparinibbāyī idhaparinibbāyīnaṁ vaseneva attho
atk-abh03a10:12_1: veditabbo. Appaṭividdhākuppova tatthaparinibbāyatīti puṭṭho idheva bhāvitena maggena
atk-abh03a10:13: Yathā migoti paṭhamaṁ udāharaṇaṁ paravādissa, dutiyaṁ sakavādissa. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a10:16_0: 274. Idāni odhisokathā nāma hoti. Tattha ye sotāpannādīnaṁ nānābhisamayavasena dukkhadassanādīhi
atk-abh03a10:16_1: odhiso odhiso ekadesena ekadesena kilesappahānaṁ icchanti seyyathāpi etarahi sammitiyādayo,
atk-abh03a10:16_2: tesaṁ taṁ laddhiṁ bhindituṁ odhisoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. Puna
atk-abh03a10:16_3: anuyogo sakavādissa, ekadesena sotāpannādibhāvassa abhāvato paṭikkhepo paravādissa.
